sage.networking.client

Interface IGameConnectionClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGameConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameConnectionClient, GameConnectionClient

    public interface IGameConnectionClient
extends IGameConnection
    Defines a game connection client. This is the client side for networking within a game.
    Author:
    Kyle Matz

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface sage.networking.IGameConnection

        IGameConnection.ProtocolType

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectTo(java.net.InetAddress remoteAddress, int remotePort)
      Connects the client to the specified InetAddress and port.
      void processPackets()
      Processes all of the packets received by the client since the last time this method was called.
      void sendPacket(java.io.Serializable object)
      Responsible for sending a Serializable object over the network.

      • Methods inherited from interface sage.networking.IGameConnection

        getAllLocalAddress, getLocalInetAddress, getLocalPort, shutdown

    • Method Detail

      • processPackets

        void processPackets()
        Processes all of the packets received by the client since the last time this method was called. This method should handle the game specific protocol for what to do with each packet.

      • connectTo

        void connectTo(java.net.InetAddress remoteAddress,
               int remotePort)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Connects the client to the specified InetAddress and port.
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - the address to connect the client to.
        remotePort - the port to connect the client to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendPacket

        void sendPacket(java.io.Serializable object)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Responsible for sending a Serializable object over the network.
        Parameters:
        object - object to send.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
